title: EPA pushes for 'smart thermostats' as way to limit pollution

Published By: Charlotte Observer: Business - Today 
The head of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency made an impassioned push Thursday for homeowners to adopt Wi-Fi-enabled "smart thermost...
